item.title: The best power banks of 2024: Expert tested
item.description: We've gone hands-on with the best power banks from Anker, Ugreen, Baseus, and more to help you find the best one for boosting your batteries.

item.title: Bluetti is offering limited-time deals on their power stations -- but not for long
item.description: There's never been a better time to invest in a Bluetti power station. Save hundreds on select models at Amazon, but hurry -- these deals end this week.

item.title: TCL's 2024 Mini LED TV lineup is here, including this eye-popping 115-incher
item.description: The company that has long been known for budget-friendly TVs is going very big - and very pricey.

item.title: The best iPhone power banks of 2024: Expert tested and reviewed
item.description: I tested the best iPhone power banks featuring wireless charging, dual ports, fast charging, and more, ensuring you get the most out of your purchase.

item.title: Skyscanner integrates ChatGPT into its travel app to help you plan your trip
item.description: Online travel platform is hoping to tap travelers who already use artificial intelligence to help with their travel itineraries.

item.title: Don't have Game Pass? Get Fallout 76 for just $6 now
item.description: Save over 90% on Fallout 76, the online multiplayer prequel to Bethesda's ultra-popular series, with this deal.

item.title: Stanford's VR breakthrough could spell the end of clunky headsets - thanks to AI
item.description: Stanford is redefining AR with glasses that combine metasurface waveguides and AI-driven holography, offering a revolutionary way to experience digital and real-world integration. Here's what it all means.

item.title: Get a Costco membership for just $40
item.description: This Costco deal gives you a $20 gift card free, effectively lowering the price of an annual Gold Star Membership to just $40. (I even bought it myself.)

item.title: How to connect Bluetooth headphones to the Xbox One, Series S, or Series X
item.description: Want to hook up your Bluetooth headphones or earbuds to your Xbox? It's easier than you think. Here's how.

item.title: Apple releases iOS 17.5: Here's what it offers and why you should update
item.description: The update adds third-party tracker detection, Apple News tweaks, a slew of security fixes, and more. Apple also released new versions of iPadOS, WatchOS, MacOS, and tvOS.

item.title: What to expect from Google I/O 2024: Gemini, Search, Android 15, and more
item.description: Google's annual developer conference takes place today, and here's what's expected to be on the docket.

item.title: iOS and Android owners will now be alerted if an unknown tracker is moving with them
item.description: Last year, Apple and Google teamed up to develop a specification for alerting users if a Bluetooth tracking device is surreptitiously monitoring them. That feature just rolled out to iOS and Android users.

item.title: The best Lenovo laptops of 2024: Expert tested and reviewed
item.description: We've tested the best Lenovo laptops on the market to help you choose the best one for your needs, whether it's for work, personal use, or gaming.

item.title: Google is planning on a fix to prevent accidental password deletion in Chrome
item.description: A default Google Chrome setting in Android could delete credentials saved in the Password Manager, but a potential fix is on the way.

item.title: How Adobe manages AI ethics concerns while fostering creativity
item.description: In this exclusive ZDNET interview, discover how Adobe's Grace Yee leads the charge in embedding ethical considerations into AI with a focus on accountability, responsibility, and transparency.

item.title: Dispelling five myths and misconceptions about data monetization
item.description: Data is still not recognized as a formal asset but your business must understand its value.

item.title: These 5 cool KDE Plasma features could woo you from Windows
item.description: If you're having trouble finding the right Linux desktop, KDE Plasma has a few tricks that could sway you.

item.title: This robot mower looks like a racecar, but it mows a gorgeous lawn
item.description: The Mammotion Luba 2 is a breeze to set up and has sophisticated mapping technology to stay on course.

item.title: How Red Hat is embracing AI to make sysadmins' lives easier
item.description: The open-source giant's AI work is all about integrating the entire Red Hat software family into a smart, easy-to-manage stack. Here's what each one does and how they fit together.

item.title: This $20 USB-C cable includes a surprisingly awesome feature
item.description: This feature is super handy for seasoned technicians and hobbyists alike.
